ygData.subject: Re: Queen of Fools
ygData.msgSnippet: How about this, big guild quest, our leader has died, and to resurect him the guild goes to the far ends of Norrath to collect pieces for a ressurection spell.
ygData.messageBody:
How about this, big guild quest, our leader has died,
and to resurect him the guild goes to the far ends of
Norrath to collect pieces for a ressurection spell. I
was holding the final, crucial piece after a week of
questing. I was in High Hold Pass, the meeting was an
hour away, so I start burning towards Lesser Fey with
the final ingrediant. After the zones, the boat trip,
running throung Greater Fey, all the guildsay is
bascially "is he here yet". I'm blazing, I look down
to grab my drink, I look up and I'm leaping from the
top of the wizard gate at full speed. This was back
before high level clerics where running around all
over the place. The guild decided to go ahead without
me, as I was bound in HHK. I was soooooooo mad. Now
it seems funny, but man...

Llewrend Lynnhaven

--- David Knadler <dknadler@...> wrote:
>
> Just thought I'd share this little tid-bit of idiocy
> with y'all....
>
> Just yesterday, I finally decided to go get my
> Lambent Bracer (my first
> lambent piece). I contacted my druid friend and had
> him gate me to
> lavastorm. I entered the temple and made my way to
> the two quest NPC's
> (forget their names). I was checking and
> re-checking, to make sure I had
> the correct components/cash. I was asking about all
> the Lambent pieces -
> insuring that my list was still up-to-date. As soon
> as I typed the 'a' in
> lambent, I started attacking the female NPC. I made
> a futile attempt to
> flee, but I made it no further than 10 paces before
> I became worm food.
>
> My friend asks : "What are you doing in Greater
> faydark?"
> I respond : "You won't believe what I just did..."
>
> Needless to say, that was about the single dumbest
> thing I've done in this
> game yet. Since I was feeling pretty bad about
> myself (I must admit it was
> pretty hilarious though) I wanted to see if any of
> you fine bards had
> boneheaded experiences of your own to share.
>
> Desmei Sightblinder
> Lvl 30 Bard [Povar] - I did, eventually, get my
> bracer
>
>
------------------------------------------------------------------------
> Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter
> to toren@... with the subject lol.
>
<HR>
<html>
>


=====
